director.name: 米哈伊尔·罗姆 Mikhail Romm

introduction: Film chronicles the life of V. I. Lenin from 1918-1921,incoporating live footage and documentary photographs of Lenin on the Khodinski (or Khodynskoe) field;around the Kremlin with V. D. Bonch-Bruyevich; at the opening of K. Marx and F. Engels monument in Moscow;at the funeral of Mark Elizarov, Y. Sverdlov; pronouncing a speech at the demonstration on May 1st,1919 and at the accompanying military parade; also pronouncing a speech from a balcony of the Mossoviet building(live audio recording of Lenin's speech); and unveiling a monument to Free Trade Work and Karl Marx.Lenin also appears among delegates of the Second Congress of Comintern,and presenting a material at the Third Congress of Comintern.At the end  there is a clip of Lenin with the American economist Kristiansen.
